titleStmt.title: Aminta: the famous pastoral. / Written in Italian by Signor' Torquato Tasso. And translated into English verse by John Dancer. Together with divers ingenious poems.
Aminta. English
titleStmt.author: Tasso, Torquato, 1544-1595.
Dancer, John, fl. 1660-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Starkey, at the Miter, near the Middle Temple-gate in Fleet-street.,

notesStmt.note: With four final advertisement leaves; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Miter, near the Middle Temple-gate in Fleet-street.
